name: MLB Bucket
description:
Made of high quality materials, durable throughout use, can be comfortably waterproof 
 The seam of the hat is extremely delicate and meticulous, conquering even the most demanding customers. The MLB hat is breathable, easy to wash and easy to maintain. 
 Embroidered motifs add a fashionable style to the hat 
 Modern bucket hat design 
 Design inspired by baseball association MLB 
 Baseball logo details prominently printed on the front 
 Soft fabric, good absorbency 
 Modern color palette that is easy to coordinate with many outfits and accessories
